channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: The Crossing
channel.description:
“He said that journeys involving the company of the dead were notorious for their difficulty but that in truth every journey was so accompanied.”
Cormac McCarthy, The Crossing ![70n7JtW_cEUhNOIw6Z5bPof7SskidhziOhcMNTs3LSE|690x401](upload://nfEHL5eTkvj0vAD15Iz9GeGaGmp.jpeg) Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.
We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG.
This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in May. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play. We will be using the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
[date=2020-05-09 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-05-09 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4oUKkRWkfrG08uPVJp [date=2020-05-16 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-05-16 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4oUdQLqQMrnH5qXlmk [date=2020-05-23 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-05-23 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]! https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4oV0krj45y7GEljyx2

item.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: The Crossing
item.dc:creator: @HorstWurst
item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

“He said that journeys involving the company of the dead were notorious for their difficulty but that in truth every journey was so accompanied.”

Cormac McCarthy, The Crossing

70n7JtW_cEUhNOIw6Z5bPof7SskidhziOhcMNTs3LSE981×571 100 KB

Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.

We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world’s most popular RPG.

This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.

There will be 3 sessions in May. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct will be in play. We will be using the X-Card) will be in use.

Saturday, May 9, 2020 4:00 PM → Saturday, May 9, 2020 7:30 PM https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4oUKkRWkfrG08uPVJp
Saturday, May 16, 2020 4:00 PM → Saturday, May 16, 2020 7:30 PM https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4oUdQLqQMrnH5qXlmk
